job.description: Task_ID: 83 restore CleanDB 17R1 to all databases
job.name: RestoreCleanDB17R1

command.script: Write-Host "Copying Clean 17R1 backup to local" Copy-Item "\\crdrs\crims\cleandb\v17R1\ISO_CLEAN17R1.bak" -Destination "D:\MSSQL\Backup"

Write-Host "Restore CleanDB 17R1 to all databases" Invoke-sqlcmd -query "USE master; ALTER DATABASE @option.CLIENT_CODE@_DEV1_MAIN SET OFFLINE with rollback immediate;RESTORE DATABASE @option.CLIENT_CODE@_DEV1_MAIN FROM DISK = 'D:\MSSQL\Backup\ISO_CLEAN17R1.bak' WITH REPLACE" -verbose Invoke-sqlcmd -query "USE master; ALTER DATABASE @option.CLIENT_CODE@_DEV2_MAIN SET OFFLINE with rollback immediate;RESTORE DATABASE @option.CLIENT_CODE@_DEV2_MAIN FROM DISK = 'D:\MSSQL\Backup\ISO_CLEAN17R1.bak' WITH REPLACE" -verbose
